export default function LaraSection() { const features = [ "Answers employee policy questions using your approved HR documents.", "Guides new hires through onboarding tasks, forms, and training steps.", "Reduces repetitive HR support load with instant, consistent responses.", ]; return (

Meet the ExplainerBot

Your HR Onboarding & Policy Guide.

A smart assistant built to make HR communication faster, clearer, and consistent.

    {features.map((feature) => (
  • {feature}
    • ))}
Get Your HR ExplainerBot
What documents do I need to complete in my first week?
HR Bot
You need to complete ID verification, tax declaration, bank details, and mandatory compliance training. I can share links for each step.
How many casual leaves can I take this year?
HR Bot
As per your current policy, you have 12 casual leaves annually. You have used 3 so far, so 9 are remaining.
); }
